description: This is a strong point. Having a dedicated section for work experience is crucial for showcasing relevant skills and abilities for a Data Scientist role.

text: Pratt Interdisciplinary Technology Lab, Brooklyn, NY
description: This experience is potentially strong if the work at the lab involved data-related tasks (e.g., data analysis, scripting, automation).  The description needs to be stronger by quantifying achievements and mentioning relevant technologies. Needs to explicitly mention projects that can translate into data science project or skills. Right now, it's too generic.

The title itself isn't directly related to data science/SWE. However, the bullet points might reveal transferable skills. It's crucial to highlight any coding, data analysis, or statistical modeling aspects of this role. Improve by focusing on the data related task on the project.

While these are basic skills, they are often expected in any professional role. Listing them isn't inherently bad, but it takes up space that could be used to showcase more relevant technical skills for a data scientist or software engineer.
Skills in Rhinoceros, Grasshopper, and Revit are useful, if they are used for data analyzation and other data related projects. Right now, it's too generic and is more related to his school major.

text: V I S U A L I Z A T I O N
description: While primarily design software, proficiency with Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator suggests a potential for data visualization. If these tools were used to create charts, graphs, or dashboards from data, it should be explicitly stated and highlighted with example data.

description: This is a general soft skill statement, not directly relevant to the technical skills required for a Data Scientist/SWE role. While soft skills are important, this section could be improved by focusing on technical skills and projects.

Knowing multiple spoken languages can be beneficial for communication in diverse teams, but its relevance is limited if the role is primarily technical. Only important if the Data Scientist will work in international environment.
